error_analysis.missed_clue: High Resistance Liquidity Run. The lows were making Higher Lows (compression) rather than equal lows. Price was holding ABOVE the previous Bullish Order Block.
error_analysis.concept_correction: Support Validation vs. Resistance. Price consolidating ABOVE a bullish PD array is acceptance of higher prices, not exhaustion. Do not bet on reversals without a clear Market Structure Shift.
error_analysis.future_rule: IF Trend is UP and Price consolidates ABOVE a Bullish PD Array -> Assume Re-Accumulation. DO NOT predict a reversal until a Low is broken with displacement.
